subject: Golf
Greenbrier Classic.(Golf)
lead_paragraph: Vijay Singh, 49, shot a seven-under-par 63 to take the first-round lead in the Greenbrier Classic in White Sulphur Springs, W.Va.
snippet: Vijay Singh, 49, shot a seven-under-par 63 to take the first-round lead in the Greenbrier Classic in White Sulphur Springs, W.Va.
